1996 (Row 26): Al Leiter's position is pitcher. Not an outfielder.
1997 (Row 27): Curt Schilling is a pitcher as well.
1998 (Row 28): Jim Thome plays first base, so not an outfielder.
1999 (Row 29): Tony Gwynn's position is outfielder. So that one fits.

I need to collect all relevant cells for each of these years' positions to confirm.
